description: Number of conics which pass through 3 points and are bitangent to a general curve of order n.
references: H. Brocard and T. Lemoyne: Courbes geometriques remarquables (courbes speciales) Planes et Gauches. Tome I, Paris: Albert Blanchard, 1967 [First publ. 1919]; see p. 411.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, write("b060783.txt", n, " ", (n-1)*n*(n^2 + 3*n - 6)/2); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 11 2009]
author: Antreas P. Hatzipolakis (xpolakis(AT)otenet.gr), Apr 28 2001
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Apr 29 2001
